item.title: Lost Bach pieces performed for first time in 320 years
item.description: Germany's Culture Minister calls the discovery a "great moment for the world of music".

item.title: Ukraine to get up to 100 French-made Rafale fighter jets
item.description: President Volodymyr Zelensky hails a "historic" deal aimed at boosting Ukraine's defences against deadly Russian air attacks.

item.title: France investigating Vinted over alleged links to pornographic content
item.description: Some sellers were found to be luring viewers to their personal pages on adult platforms such as OnlyFans.

item.title: South Africa to refuse charter flights of Palestinians over fears of 'cleansing agenda'
item.description: Israel says South Africa had previously agreed to receive the 153 Palestinians who arrived last week.

item.title: Louvre closes gallery due to structural issue
item.description: The Campana Gallery, which host Greek ceramics, will remain closed as beams supporting the floor above are checked.
